Package index

Core Gameplay

Main control flow of the Blackjack game.

play()
Play a Full Interactive Game of Blackjack
ask_play_again()
Ask to play again
play_player_turns()
Play player turns (with coins and computer players)
determine_winner()
Determine winner(s) of a Blackjack game
exit()
Exit Blackjack session

Player Mechanics

Player actions, bets, input/output, and turn logic.

input_players()
Input and validate human and computer players
player_action()
Player action: hit, stand, or double (with betting)
handle_splitting()
Handle splitting
handle_insurance()
Handle insurance and dealer blackjack check
get_bets()
Get Bets from Players

Outcome and Scoring

Game ending, scoring, and decision helpers.

calculate_score()
Calculate Blackjack Score
is_blackjack()
Check if a hand is Blackjack
is_five_card_charlie()
Check 5-card Charlie condition
end_round()
End round processing

Data Management

Saving/loading player data and managing results.

save_players()
Save players to disk
load_players()
Load players from disk
display_final_results()
Display final results with betting outcomes
plot_player_ranking()
Plot current player ranking
plot_bankroll_history()
Plot bankroll history over rounds

Initial Setup & Utilities

Supporting functions for initial game state and dealer logic.

deal_cards()
Deal initial cards in Blackjack
dealer_action()
Dealer action logic
setup_and_display_initial()
Set up the game and display initial hands with bets
reset_game_data()
Reset game memory: players_db and/or bankroll_history

Internal Utilities

Useful internal helpers exposed to users.

get_home_dir()
Get the User's Home Directory
new_blackjack_hand()
Create a blackjack hand (S3 vctrs)
format(<blackjack_hand>)
Format a Blackjack Hand
